summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development; authorizing the completion of plans, specifications and estimates, and the construction of certain street improvements in the West Woodland Neighborhood Improvement Program, North 50th/Phinney Ave. N. St. improvement project, making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts therefor, and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
